page.title: 04LLANYRE CHURCH
page.content: Llanyre Church is 101 years old and stands in the centre of the little village of Llanyre.The vicar is Canon Winford Rees who lives in the vicarage.Every Sunday there is a service usually Holy Communion.We have five servers and one other man helping the vicar.We have Sunday school every Sunday afternoon at half past two.We also have a choir which meet every Monday night for choir practice. Every year we have the annual Harvest Supper in the Church Hall. Before the supper we have a service of Holy Communion.The Harvest Supper is a happy event and people from lots of other parishes join us. Last year it was the vicar's anniversary of being with the church for 25 years.
